website_summaries.verdict: A good deal by a top name in the lock industry. Affordable, convenient, and reliable for most security needs.
pros: Clearly visible numbers on the front and side
Combination is effortlessly set w/personalized numbers
Comes with clear instructions and lifetime warranty
cons: Some owners say it's larger than expected
It's on the heavy side, but it's not ideal for heavy-duty needs

customer_reviews.title: Not safe
customer_reviews.text: I used this lock for a locker. Somebody broke this lock and stole everything.
customer_reviews.author: jackusa

customer_reviews.title: Decoration only
customer_reviews.text: Just lost everything from my gym locker. DO NOT TRUST this lock for anything you value. A quick web search shows that with firm pressure downward on the lock, a thief only need start with the bottom number first and work upwards. As the correct number is moved into alignment, the lock body will give slightly. Takes just a few seconds and you will make a thief very happy. Please consider this something to use for decorative purposes only and never to protect anything of value.
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: Combination must be set in order to lock it
customer_reviews.text: I use this for my gym locker. It works fine and is easy to use. One nit-pick that I would change: in order to lock it, it has to be on the correct combination. I would prefer it if you could scramble the numbers and then close the lock. What you have to do instead is make sure the numbers are set the the correct combination, close the lock, and then scramble the numbers. This typically requires 2 hands and is, in my opinion, an unnecessary step when all you want to do is lock it scrambled anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Traxbe

customer_reviews.title: Lock was easily broken and my valuables were stolen out of my gym locker!
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this lock. It looks good and is easy to set a combination, but it does nothing! My locker at the gym was broken into with this lock and the theif did not even need to use bolt cutters. He was somehow able to just open the lock on the other side. See the picture of what this lock looks like now. I would ask for a refund, but it’s been a couple years now since I purchased this. All I can say, is for peace of mind just buy a sturdier more Secure lock.
customer_reviews.author: SY

customer_reviews.title: If you want to get in and out fast, look no further.  This is the lock you want.
customer_reviews.text: Best lock ever, for the gym. Look no further. I came back and bought again, (one for my daughter). Why do I think this is an amazing design? When at the gym, I look at guys spinning their paddle lock, (a 50 year old design), that is virtually drama and takes extra time (a pain point). With this new generation design, you can eliminate pain points. You can get in and out in seconds, while the guy next to you is still spinning his old dated Masterlock. If you want to get in and out, fast, look no further. This is the lock you want.
customer_reviews.author: M-I-Coug

customer_reviews.title: Won't work for some lockers
customer_reviews.text: Very hefty heavy lock with wheels that are easy to turn. However, if the locker has a wide loop, it is challenging to get the lock to slide in the locker hole as the distance between the base of the lock and the curved arm is quite small. See video, as this is hard to explain.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great easy to use lock.
customer_reviews.text: Wife always had problems remembering the combination as we only access it on a storage locker every few months. Found this lock which solves the problem and was super easy to program a 4 digit combination. Purchased two of these locks and it takes about 30 seconds to set a combination. Recommend you find a video that shows the procedure instead of trying to figure it our from the super small print instructions. Locks may not be as secure as needed to protect something valuable but for storage lockers or temp gym needs it is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: watson4664

customer_reviews.title: Too large for easy use on a locker
customer_reviews.text: The padlock works well. The self-set combo function was easy to use. Unfortunately, they're not very ergonomic when used with a standard gym locker. They're too broad to fit easily into the loop, and that also makes it difficult to twist the lock so you can see the side where the combination is set. If I had it to do over, I would buy a different type of lock. Also, you don't get to pick the color. I like the orange side color I got, but that was just luck of the draw.
customer_reviews.author: Lindley Karstens

customer_reviews.title: this works fine. For example
customer_reviews.text: Working well for the specific need I had. This is not a lock for uber-secure purposes, because it could be quickly broken with with a hammer, for instance. However, if you need a basic lock that can be quickly released without requiring a key, this works fine. For example, it would work for preventing small children from opening prohibited containers, or for meeting legal requirements in transporting firearms in the back of a vehicle. I also use it on ammo cans in my securely locked garage.
customer_reviews.author: hitpure

customer_reviews.title: Finally, I Can Remember the Combo!
customer_reviews.text: I'm used to the "old" bike locks that you have to remember the number, and yet it's something so odd, that you can't remember it. Now, I can set it to a number that makes sense to me. I do want to say that for someone like me who wears reading glasses, that it is hard for me to read the numbers without my glasses. And that's the only reason that I gave it 4 stars instead of 5. I also appreciated the video some made that shows how to set the numbers on the lock. That video was a lot more helpful than the directions themselves.
customer_reviews.author: Laura from MI

customer_reviews.title: Gym Lock Perfection
customer_reviews.text: It is easy to use, it isn't huge or too small, it is perfect. I use lock in on my gym bag zipper when I am traveling back and forth, change at the gym and toss all my stuff in a day use locker and slap this lock on and I have peace of mind. It is a pretty substantial lock, it is definitely not small like a TSA travel lock, so just be aware of that. It has some heft to it, but I have had no issues getting it to fit on standard lock hasps. Great, cheap protection.
customer_reviews.author: OleMissLaw

customer_reviews.title: Great lock for the gym!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this lock so I could stop using my luggage lock at Planet Fitness. This has been a great addition to my gym bag. It feels secure and heavy enough, plus the way you actually read the code on the side is perfect after a good workout. This was a great purchase and is a requirement for anyone building out your gym bag.
customer_reviews.author: JBaumannReviews

customer_reviews.title: My new favorite lock for gyms and other lockers when traveling.
customer_reviews.text: I love this lock. It's flat and doesn't get in the way like the dial ones do, and I'm often getting into my stuff in the dark, and this lock makes it easy to unlock and re-lock in the dark by feeling the clicks of the numbers (if you preset the numbers to be unscrambled). I've bought a couple more since for larger toolboxes and such, and my first lock is still going strong after decent use and abuse.
customer_reviews.author: Cheyene 123

customer_reviews.title: Perfect locker lock
customer_reviews.text: Needed a combination lock for locker at work. Wanted something easier and quicker to use than the usual dial combo lock. This lock is perfect. Easy to program own personal number. Easy to see/read under fluorescent lights. Numerals are large enough for easy reading. The tumblers move easily and the detent makes them snap into place. Not too large. Not too small.
customer_reviews.author: madclark

customer_reviews.title: Amazon Sent Me a Heavily USED Lock
customer_reviews.text: NOT NEW. Used! No doubt, this is a used lock that has been beaten up. Check out the photos. This is how the lock looked straight out of the plastic. It was not listed as used. This is on Amazon, since they repackaged a heavily used item and sold it as new. Boo. And the lock doesn’t work bc it wasn’t reset to ‘0000’. No idea what the combo is. FAIL.
customer_reviews.author: Rob M

customer_reviews.title: Not Bad. I suggest to Try it
customer_reviews.text: The first lock I received did not respond to the combination lock and was pretty much useless, but Amazon happily shipped me a new one with no problems. The lock is lightly bigger than my palm and is a good weight, but personally I like the strong feel of it. The color you receive varies, but I had received a red and orange one. Both colors are vibrant.
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: Solid/ easy to use lock
customer_reviews.text: The lock is easy to set up and seems to work well. I was disappointed to see that a number’s paint is already fading (see picture), and I just opened it. Update: I was able to get a free replacement, which looks good, so I’ve updated my review to 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for a little combination lock
customer_reviews.text: Easy to program new 4 digit code, lock my outside outlet box and keeps it safe from anyone just using my electricity, and is easy to use. You must have the password on lock to lock it is the only drawback. Put code in, push lock in and then spin any number to lock it.
customer_reviews.author: timwalls2

customer_reviews.title: Security
customer_reviews.text: Got this lock for my step son, he is with us every two weeks and at his other house for two weeks. We bought a large foot locker for his personal things (legos mid build, his candy stash, etc) to keep our toddler out of his stuff. I saw the reviews that said that this lock comes open easily and for most that would be an issue but for me it was a selling point, in case he forgets his combo we can break into it! It’s easy for his little fingers (he’s 8) and he got to set his own combination code. Very happy with this lock.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Gym Lock!
customer_reviews.text: I have had several of these locks (only due to me leaving them by accident!) for use at the gym, and they are great quality. The product feels substantial and secure. Setting the combination is super easy and takes less than 3 minutes. Having a combination to open is much nicer to use at a gym so that you don't have to mess around with a key while you are working out. Would definitely recommend this for those looking for an easy to use cheap lock.
customer_reviews.author: Jake Davison

customer_reviews.title: Cute, easy to set up, and it works
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping to get the red one that's shown, but instead received a pretty blue lock. It was pretty easy to set the combination (I always forget the ones that come pre-set), but you really do have to follow the directions exactly. I had to repeat the process to get it right, but it worked the second time, and I really like it. The four spinning number combo reminds me of what you'd see on a suitcase, and they are really smooth and haven't given me any trouble. I use it in a locker room that's connected to a pool, and can't complain-- I'd buy another one if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Shelton

customer_reviews.title: Useless piece of junk waste of money
customer_reviews.text: This is a scam and a waste of money. I spent a full hour trying to reset the code from 0000. I followed written and video instructions online. Nothing worked, and when I was done, neither the code I wanted to use NOR 0000 would open the lock. This is an absolute piece of junk. Save your time and money.
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: Great Locker Lock
customer_reviews.text: This locker lock was simple to set up with a four digit combination. It only took a moment and had excellent directions. It is easy to lock and unlock on the locker at work, and I feel provides the level of theft deterrent I need.
customer_reviews.author: Norman Edelen

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Use
customer_reviews.text: I would use negative stars if possible. We had this lock on a locker at a recreation center. Two of us checked to make sure it was locked. When we returned to the locker the lock was off our locker so somehow the lock code was manipulated. Luckily none of our items were stolen (wallet, phones, keys). It's a miracle!! DO NOT USE this lock. You may not be as lucky.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia M.

customer_reviews.title: Lock doesn’t fit many gym lockers.
customer_reviews.text: The lock is too think and I have extreme trouble using it on the gym lockers. Also the numbers are on the side of the lock but of course you can’t see them when the lock is being used. I had to set numbers that were 1 off and even then I had to remember which side of the numbers were the correct side.
customer_reviews.author: C. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Pick a Color and Throw Down
customer_reviews.text: Its bigger than your average gym lock...but I like that. The little ones are too hard to seen the numbers. I don't wear my glasses at the gym and really hate not being able to see the combination when I get back to the locker. I also like being able to spin them from the side with both fingers. In fact I like everything there is to like about this thing. If you want the luggage bag style gym lock this is not for you. If you want something substantial you can work easily and feel like you have something substantial locking your valuables at the gym then look no further. Pick a color and throw down.
customer_reviews.author: paxfax

customer_reviews.title: Great and useful product!
customer_reviews.text: Thanks for getting this item shipped as described. The original packaging looked well kept. This item works as described. Really easy to reset the lock code and ease of use. Absolutely love and recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Gia Smith

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly fine and sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely adequate. BUT, I advise that you imagine this hanging wherever you're going to use it, and figure out at what angle you will be likely to view the numbers when entering the combination. The numbers you need to view with this lock are in the colored area on the SIDE. The numbers on the front show only so that you can move them. Will that work best for you, or do you need a lock that shows the combination on the front?
customer_reviews.author: Alyson R H L

customer_reviews.title: Colors are random
customer_reviews.text: Ordered two-the colors are specified like in the photo-they’re random. We got a purple and an orange...color for this isn’t a big deal but it should have been specified in the description. Other than that, great quality!
customer_reviews.author: Collette

customer_reviews.title: Great lock!
customer_reviews.text: Love the idea of setting your own combo. Lock is not small but not too large. Ideal for lockers. Very sturdy. The only down side is that you do not get to pick a color.
customer_reviews.author: Miljana Mitrovic

customer_reviews.title: Gym locker but good for other things to
customer_reviews.text: Good heavy lock. I forget if I got to choose my color or not (?). Either way I got/picked lime green. It’s not to small or big but quite heavy. I use it for the gym and it’s slim design is perfect for the lockers they have.
customer_reviews.author: Jessygirl

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Use. Easy to Break Into.
customer_reviews.text: Thought this was a good lock at first. Had good reviews and stars (with only a few exceptions). Easy to use as well. Today someone went through all the lockers at my local gym and tried to bust the locks. Of all the locks that showed damage and signs of attempted break ins, my locker with THIS lock was the ONLY one that was broken into. From photo, looks like someone wedged it open. Again, easy to use and apparently easy to break into. If you want real security with a lock, I would suggest paying a bit more and getting something else.
customer_reviews.author: Kenny

customer_reviews.title: Master Lock, second one!
customer_reviews.text: -Master Lock brand name - Owned a master lock which I used for an outdoor shed for 8 years before it became too beat up by the weather and starting sticking and not locking as easily. - This lock is lighter weight, but feels just as strong. - Combination is easy to set, the numbers on the SIDE are where you open and close the lock by scrolling to the combo you set. - Setting the combo is easy and took about 5 minutes to do and test. - Pleased with the price and the quick shipping from amazon! - Note this did NOT come with a key. Some I have seen come with both a combo and a key.
customer_reviews.author: LG19Gamer

customer_reviews.title: Great for the Gym
customer_reviews.text: I got this lock for the gym and it works great. Make sure you read the directions when you first start messing with it. I accidentally started to try and set the lock without reading the directions and I got all confused. It took me a while to get the lock to work, but now it works great no issues. I also wish you could pick the color because I got the green one that I don't like, but oh well!
customer_reviews.author: Ruza16

customer_reviews.title: Keeps out the old men
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, now I know all those naked old men in the locker room aren’t doing weird stuff in my locker.
customer_reviews.author: jamis

customer_reviews.title: Very "locky" I bought this ;)
customer_reviews.text: A perfect all around lock! My husband uses this for his locker at work. It is real simple to set or reset the passcode, and locks very securely. The numbers are easily turned and unlocks smoothly. No issues at all. It was larger than expected and would fit most locks, in my opinion. You cannot choose your color unfortunately. But we received a very nice, bright orange lock that looked pretty cool despite the fact I don't like orange.
customer_reviews.author: Swissysmile

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for short trips to the gym
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set your own combination and change as needed. We got a blue color when it was shipped. Good to use on standard lockers at our gym but a little more difficult in the family locker room because the door lock area is a little wider.
customer_reviews.author: Louie Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: so far working great. I saw a few reviews on the setup
customer_reviews.text: so far working great. I saw a few reviews on the setup, but it was easy enough to setup. The writing on the package is REALLY small so that may have been the issue. So much easier to use than traditional combination locks. I also noticed as others that it's a Little awkward to close and lock at the same time, but I can still close and move the dial with one hand so not a big issue. My only complaint with getting it was it was a different color than what I chose.
customer_reviews.author: LivewithPassion

customer_reviews.title: Readable Numbers for Multi-users
customer_reviews.text: I placed two of these locks on the gates to a neighborhood community tennis court. The numbers are small, but the people who use the locks apparently are not having problems with that. I've had these locks in place for a month or so now, and no complaints from the people who use the courts. I wasn't able to select the color of the lock face, but that was not a problem for me. I ended up with a yellow and a blue lock. To set my own combination, I had to go through a few steps. That is good, so others do not reset to another combination by accident.
customer_reviews.author: Ken in St Augustine

customer_reviews.title: Master Lock 653D Combination Padlock works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Master Lock 653D Combination Padlock works as advertised. I needed a simple combination lock for my gym locker and this one was perfect. I couldn't request the color I wanted, so was pleasantly surprised that is arrived in the color that I had hoped it would... orange. :) I would not use it for anything that needed robust security, but for my gym locker.... it fit the bill.
customer_reviews.author: Monte Daughhetee

customer_reviews.title: Really like this. Less finicky than the rotating locks and ...
customer_reviews.text: Really like this. Less finicky than the rotating locks and the fact that you can set your own code is nice. It feels really durable. I mostly use it for my bag at the gym, not for something higher risk like a lock on a bike in a public place, so I have no experience for how it holds up to an actual attack, but it feels very robust.
customer_reviews.author: Chris in ColoradoTop Contributor: Fantasy Books

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality and Stylish combo lock.
customer_reviews.text: This lock is so good i bought another one right after i received this one and saw how good of quality it was. I needed a lock for my gym locker and i bought a cheaper version of this one from a convenience store close by and it broke after a few uses, it was just to flimsy. I like the construct of it, the quality, and toughness of this lock. No one is breaking into my locker unless they have a pair of clippers. I also like how the color is built into the design where you turn the dials for the combination.
customer_reviews.author: Sphenman

customer_reviews.title: Great lock for a new lock user and people who hate the complexity of spin locks
customer_reviews.text: For a first locker combination lock, I liked this because I didn't have to teach my child left this many times, right this many times, then back to left, and he could set his own combination. It is just as sturdy as the spinning kind and he knows to mix up the numbers when he's through. It's a good transitional lock and honestly could work for many years as well. This kind would really save time when you're in a hurry at your locker. Update, purchased another and the lock did not lock or set, but Amazon replaced easily and free so no problem
customer_reviews.author: LJMom

customer_reviews.title: Cash and credit card stolen
customer_reviews.text: My gym locker was broken into. Credit card and cash stolen. I came back to my gym locker noticed the lock was jammed. Couldn't rotate the numeric dial. The lock finally opened when I pulled on it hard. I immediately checked my wallet. Credit card and cash were gone. I used the phone credit card app to lock the card. Thirty minutes later, there was an unauthorized charge (attempt) on my locked credit card. Do not use this lock to secure you valuable items. Easily broken into.
customer_reviews.author: Danny Boy

customer_reviews.title: crappy import
customer_reviews.text: This is one of Master's worst product and I have no idea why others rate it highly. The mechanism is imprecise but my biggest complaint is that the shackle locks from fixed side only. Better locks have a notch on the free side of the shackle. This lock can be defeated with a single pound from a common hammer. I shall look further for a higher security item. This might keep the honest folks out but it will do nothing to deter a mildly committed thief. BTW it is made in china and I thought Master built their products at home.
customer_reviews.author: Cincinnati Jake

customer_reviews.title: Good lock
customer_reviews.text: I do like this lock. I just wish the numbers to unlock were on the front, not the side. I like the blue color one the best but I think that’s just a personal preference.
customer_reviews.author: Has21

customer_reviews.title: Unable to set it
customer_reviews.text: I have tried many times to set the combination on this lock unsuccessfully.
customer_reviews.author: Dedicated Online Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Good price and the ability to set my own combo ...
customer_reviews.text: Good price and the ability to set my own combo is very nice. Color-coding (you just get a random color) is also helpful I suspect that this would come off if you hit it with a hammer or another heavy object (but I didn't test the thing). The numbers are also a little slippery if you have wet or greasy fingers... which might be an issue if tumblers start to stick as it ages.. not a problem now thought.
customer_reviews.author: Rob DC

customer_reviews.title: Favorite lock!
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite lock, I use this at the gym every day. It is made of great quality and it has lasted me for at least 2 years and still looks in perfect shape. I can absolutely recommend this to anyone looking for a good lock.
customer_reviews.author: Cesar

customer_reviews.title: Great lock
customer_reviews.text: I had this lock for about a year and several weeks ago I lost it, probably left it at the gym. I bought another one just like it as I am totally happy with the design and the functionality of this lock. Never once had any difficulties locking / unlocking. Setting your own combination is very easy and useful, takes about 30 seconds. The design is nice, too; very aesthetic looking. This one is much more convenient then those round locks where you have to turn it clockwise and counter-clockwise to enter the combination, and then you happen to miss the right digit and have to start all over. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: LD

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the gym....no need to carry around a key!
customer_reviews.text: I needed a lock for when I go to the gym but didn't want to have to carry a key around with me. This lock is super easy to program with your own numerical combination. It's a 4 digit number combination. Easy to use and perfect for what I needed it for! The only part I didn't like was that you couldn't choose which color you got. I luckily got a color I did like, but I would have liked the option of picking a color. Otherwise it's perfect
customer_reviews.author: Michele

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Lock
customer_reviews.text: A simple and easy to use Lock that fits every locker I have ever used and never caused me any problems. Lost my first lock I bought a couple years ago, came right back to buy the same one again.
customer_reviews.author: AdventureDog

customer_reviews.title: Its Fine
customer_reviews.text: If you want some thing for the GYM and its ease to use buy it. The Instructions on how to change the combination are crazy small and vary hard to read. I had to go to YouTube and figure it out.
customer_reviews.author: MIchael L Meyer

customer_reviews.title: Great Design
customer_reviews.text: I really like this lock. It's perfect for going to the gym. It's durable and easy to use. I also like the design of it. It feels sturdy and yet is compact enough to be able to use on most gym lockers that I've seen.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Z

customer_reviews.title: Fragile Lock.. does not do its purpose..
customer_reviews.text: Someone easily broke this lock in the gym while I was working out yesterday. It appears that thief used just a physical force only. Luckily, I had no valuable in the locker. The lock failed to carry its purpose.. which is secure our belongings. Will not recommend this product to anyone who cares about securing their belongings.
customer_reviews.author: Eric H.

customer_reviews.title: Thin and Easy to Use
customer_reviews.text: I really like that this padlock is thin in my bag and easy to unlock. Setting the combination is not intuitive, but it is easy to do with the instructions. I was forever forgetting my combination on my spinning padlocks. With this, I just chose my four widgets, set it, and I'm good to go! The reason I gave four stars instead of five is that the lock does seem a bit lightweight - almost like it would pry apart pretty easy. However, I'm not going to test it. Also, I with you could choose the color. The red looks great in the photo, but mine came as a lime green.
customer_reviews.author: B. Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Number on the front should be where the combo goes not side
customer_reviews.text: Really cheap made. The numbers are on the side for the combo so you have to angle your head weird when it’s on a locker
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Was thrilled to find this lock on Amazon and happy with it so far
customer_reviews.text: Got this lock for my boyfriend to use with his kryptonite double loop cable. I was worried both loops of the cable would not fit through the lock but they do! It took a few tries but was able to get our personal lock combo to work within a few minutes. We are always loosing the keys for our masterlocks, and forgetting combinations. Was thrilled to find this lock on Amazon and happy with it so far!
customer_reviews.author: JJW

customer_reviews.title: Different but works great
customer_reviews.text: It’s an awesome lock that works as described. Wish the combination was on the face instead of the side it’s hard to see what you put in sometimes. Overall recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: ali

customer_reviews.title: Can't read numbers without my reading glasses
customer_reviews.text: This looks like a nice lock, but I have to return it cause I can't read the shiny silver numbers without my reading glasses. I purchased for locker at water aerobics & can't use my glasses at the pool. Somehow I thought from the pictures the number background was white with black numbers. I got it because someone reviewed it as easy to read for seniors without their glasses, not true for me! This is the second lock I purchased that I can't read, so going to the Master lock speed dial without numbers.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Lock dork approves
customer_reviews.text: I love this lock. Easy to program and use. Maybe I just enjoy not carrying around a key anymore, I am very excited about owning this lock for the gym.
customer_reviews.author: ssstephanie

customer_reviews.title: Initial lock default setting location
customer_reviews.text: Rating is only 4 star because of the packaging and not the lock itself. The lock is what I wanted and works very well. The package drawing shows the initial default 0.0.0.0 setting on the front of the lock and is deceiving. The initial setting is on the side of the lock.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Ross

customer_reviews.title: Numbers on side
customer_reviews.text: the numbers are displayed on the side so when it's recessed in a locker cavity it's very hard to read what the combo is that you're entering.
customer_reviews.author: alexander prothero

customer_reviews.title: Not for recessed type lockers.. It is larger than it looks.
customer_reviews.text: If your school or gym locker has a well type handle or recessed latch, this is not the lock you want as it will not fit.
customer_reviews.author: Randy

customer_reviews.title: Work great at the gym for my 8 year old an I
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these locks becaues I needed simplicity. I kept forgetting the combinations of my previous locks. I knew if I could set the combo the problem would no longer occur. I ordered an extra and my daughter latched onto it immediately she feels much more secure when swimming with a lock and has had no problem unlocking it. Unlock other users I found the instructions for setting the combo to work well. The wording was weird but I tried it and it worked perfectly. All in all a great lock I just wish you could pick the color!
customer_reviews.author: AK_Lydia

customer_reviews.title: Nice solid lock for a gym locker!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for the gym. It is nice and sturdy, large bar to prevent theft. The combination is easy to put in (and easy to set). This also has good weight and sturdiness. Perfect for my needs!
customer_reviews.author: cldsk

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Use
customer_reviews.text: Easy to setup combination. I prefer this over the traditional wheel combination locks because it's faster. The lock itself is small and fit into the locker slot nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Unknown

customer_reviews.title: Lock
customer_reviews.text: As others have stated, mine came without a 000 preset and was already turned to numbers. I had to reset it and then program it myself. Also, the 0-0-0 preset does't make any sense if there are 4 digits but whatever. I use this strictly for the gym so I just need something simple and it gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: R. RobertsTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Good for low-risk areas
customer_reviews.text: I use this lock in a closed/locked bike locker room, so I'm confidant it will keep my stuff safe. Not sure I'd use this in an open high-risk area, but that's not what I bought it for.
customer_reviews.author: Gary R.

customer_reviews.title: Good, but Didn't fit my lock box
customer_reviews.text: I like this padlock very much, very easy to set and see the numbers. However, the box I bought it for isn't compatible. The hole where the padlock arm goes in is too small. It's a good sturdy padlock, but be sure the item you're locking has a padlock hole large enough to accomodate it.
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Using it on my gym locker. Have bought a few over the years. Great and easy to set combination. Also looks very attractive.
customer_reviews.author: Logan Mews

customer_reviews.title: It is a sturdy lock and one can easily set the combination - ...
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for a Lock to use at my Gym which could fit into my gym bag compactly and which isn't bulky or big. It is a sturdy lock and one can easily set the combination - following the directions that comes along. It is easy to spin the numbers wheels to your four digit combination to open the lock, and equally easy to spin them to a non-combination number to lock. Best feature of it is to have the numbers on the side rather than on the bottom. Making it easy to open or close when using bottom row lockers
customer_reviews.author: Preeti JLo

customer_reviews.title: Great Padlock
customer_reviews.text: This is a much simpler & easier padlock. Setting up the combination is easy - Simply open, rotate properly, set the new combo, and close. This has worked very well for me. It is easier for me than the old high school rotational locks. I always had trouble making sure they are on the right number. This padlock is easy to see the combination & you only remember 4 digits. It is also great that it doesn't stay closed unless you rotate the numbers off of your combination. I cannot accidentally leave the unlock combination set in the padlock.
customer_reviews.author: Ian McGuire

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: Durable. Bought a few years ago for my first child's junior high locker, then again for the younger kids. Original one is still working after many years. I like that I can pick a combination. That way we pick a number they can remember easily. Easy to set the combination the first time, but harder to change later on.
customer_reviews.author: JD1234

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Very quick and easy to open/program. Thin profile fits well with various gym lockers. Minus one star because you have to have the combo in place to lock it, and hold the lock closed while you spin the combo, which can be a pain when your juggling other stuff in your hands.
customer_reviews.author: David FazzariTop Contributor: Archery

customer_reviews.title: Don’t need so many keys in my pocket anymore!
customer_reviews.text: Used these type for years on my sheds. They hold up great and the best part is I don’t have to carry more keys around with me, got enough as it is. I picked up a few more for the generator and log splitter etc. The fact that you set the combination makes remembering it much easier also
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: and absolutely loved everything about it
customer_reviews.text: I received this lock a few weeks ago, and absolutely loved everything about it. It looks and feels great. Then tonight, just a few weeks after getting, I used it to lock my locker at the gym, and when I cam back 45 minutes later, the lock was gone - someone had broken into my locker! (And taken my lock). Now I have to buy a new one :( Probably won't be this one - I'm not so sure how strong it is...
customer_reviews.author: JR Becker

customer_reviews.title: Nice low security lock.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, but not secure enough for important areas. Nice cheap lock.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Update: it have been over 6 months since I bought it and start using it and I still didn’t have any issues with it so it’s still 5/5 stars from me. I have been using it in the gym for a while and didn't had any issue.
customer_reviews.author: Sensei

customer_reviews.title: A little finicky
customer_reviews.text: For the price it's a good lock but not very strong. It's a little difficult to set up with the way you have to set the lock.
customer_reviews.author: Morgaine

customer_reviews.title: Great for traveling Europe or at the gym
customer_reviews.text: My girlfriend and I brought these to Europe to secure our backpacks in hostels. The code is easy to set, but I never accidentally changed it. The lock is easy to use and feels sturdy. From what I've read any brand of combination lock is easy to open if a thief knows what he's doing. That being said we couldn't crack each others locks after reading directions. Like others it won't lock unless it's set on the code. I now use it at the gym.
customer_reviews.author: K. Conroy

customer_reviews.title: Good Lock, wish you could select your own color
customer_reviews.text: Purchased 2 of these for my Wife and I to take to the gym. I wish Amazon they would let you select the color, as we both ended up with Red ones so I had to mark our initial on them so we knew whose was whose. They are very easy to setup and select your personal combination, they are not to clunky. I noticed some folks said they don't fit on their gym lockers but we have no problem at ours. If your looking for an easy to use combination lock that you can set your own combination, this is one is great, especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: AHelpfulVoice

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money - but a little clunky
customer_reviews.text: Pros : - Setting the lock's combination was pretty easy - it took me maybe around 3 minutes to read the instructions and do it. - Having a personalized combination is nice! I'm sharing a locker with my boyfriend so we set it to our anniversary - something easy to remember. - Sturdy and not TOO large Cons : - Turning the numbers isn't as smooth as a typical dial combination lock - it isn't as easy to do with one hand - The numbers are on the side so you kind of have to turn it towards you to set
customer_reviews.author: minamesephy

customer_reviews.title: I like this type of lock
customer_reviews.text: Good for gym lockers I like the look of the lockEasy to dial combination quick much better than spin-the-dial combo locks. Like being able to change combination easy to do once you get the process down
customer_reviews.author: Keith Whipkey

customer_reviews.title: Decent lock that stands out in the locker room
customer_reviews.text: I bought this lock because I wanted something that stands out from the sea of other locks in the gym locker room. It certainly stands out, which is nice. I also like how I can set my own code. For its size, I would have expected it to be a bit heavier; this initially had me concerned that the craftsmanship was lacking, but have found no reason to support this notion after several months of use. Note: You cannot choose your color. This was not important to me, but it is a notable shortfall.
customer_reviews.author: BW

customer_reviews.title: Great lock
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased this lock a few times because I lose it. This lock is built well and holds up well to daily use.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle N.

customer_reviews.title: Good gym lock.....
customer_reviews.text: Great gym locker lock. I miss my old Master lock that I used for twenty plus years. I use the same combo less the first digit on this one. I can turn one roller and secure the lock which makes it easier to unlock after my swims. The letters are too small though and I have to wait a few minutes for my vision to clear so that I can see the numbers. Be nice if the numbers were a bit larger for old farts like me.
customer_reviews.author: J. Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Piece of crap
customer_reviews.text: Piece of crap!!! Lock was broken when I received it. Would not turn to set. Then I noticed that outside was not completely connected.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonAddicted

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: It works well, and while it’s not hard to use, I just prefer the dial locks and wish I got that instead.
customer_reviews.author: Kal Parso

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: It’s great for lockers and easier to open compared to combination locks that number combination goes clockwise and counter clockwise to open
customer_reviews.author: Angelo D.

customer_reviews.title: Nice reprogramming lock.
customer_reviews.text: Thought I was ordering a red lock, but came orange. Not an issue for me, just surprised. I really like the reprogramming option. Was really easy and done in about 20 seconds. Lightweight and sturdy. Good company with a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works Great - Using it for Gym Locker
customer_reviews.text: This lock arrived promptly, was easy to create a combination, and fits nicely on my gym locker. Not sure how difficult it would be to cut with a bolt cutter, though arguably most locks could be cut with a bolt cutter!
customer_reviews.author: AB

customer_reviews.title: Very smooth!
customer_reviews.text: I owned a lot of combo locks in the past and most of them would become so tough and rusty that I would wrestle just to open and close it, but not with this! Over half a year later and it still very smooth to open and close: The moment your combo is in, it slides out on its own without any resistance. Setting your own combination is easy as well. This is definitely an ideal lock for gym and school lockers.
customer_reviews.author: Dmitry Kristal

customer_reviews.title: combination shows on the side
customer_reviews.text: my only complaint is that the reading for the combination is on the side. I don't know if that is going to cause any troubles in my gym locker. I'd rather the numbers I am selecting be on the front. But the lock is cheap, so it has that going for it.
customer_reviews.author: john williams

customer_reviews.title: Great Lock as long as you don't use it in freezing temps
customer_reviews.text: These are good and work as intended. Easy to set combination. But, one word of warning: they freeze when it gets cold. So, if you have this locking a shed with a snow blower in it (like I did), you may find yourself getting quite frustrated as you try to get your shed open with a frozen lock! A little bit of heat from a lighter did the trick. For any application where you won't experience freezing temperatures, this is a fine lock.
customer_reviews.author: Doug

customer_reviews.title: Well, it's a lock...
customer_reviews.text: Works great. I have problems with fine motor skills, and I was able to set my combination. I'm headed to the gym later today, which is what I bought this lock for. If you have fine motor skill impairments, this is great, as you do one number at a time. It looks and feels secure, yet I doubt many people are going to go trying to pick at gym locker locks. Gives me the security of knowing that I can keep my wallet and such locked up.
customer_reviews.author: Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed for the gym
customer_reviews.text: I find this lock perfectly adequate for a gym locker. I did not have difficulty setting the combination; the instructions were quite simple and clear. I gave 4 stars instead of 5 because the lock is more cheaply made than I would like, and I am often worried that I will accidentally reset the lock when I am moving the latch part around as I move the lock away from the locker. Also, it would be nice if I could have chosen the color. :) For the price, I would recommend this product as a gym lock.
customer_reviews.author: Review Shrew

customer_reviews.title: Love this lock, very convenient
customer_reviews.text: I use this for the gym. Very easy once you set the code. Set and go, no key needed!! Love this lock.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, strong, easy to set combo. Barely fits on lockers at YMCA, but it does if I finagle it the right way. Meaning, it is a little bit on the large side for dinky gym lockers, but will probably work in most cases if you're willing to fiddle with it a little.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Angelos

customer_reviews.title: Lock it up!
customer_reviews.text: I use this primarily for a gym lock; I've used combo locks which I've lost the combo and another one which was quite bulky. I like this lock, its slim and low profile. The quality of the product feels nice in my hands. The fit and finish of this combo lock is unlike most combo locks, definitely highly quality. I only give it 4 stars because the loop at the top is a wee bit smaller than I anticipated, its never impacted me at all but for other buyers.
customer_reviews.author: Bhuman

product_meta.title: Master Lock 653D Locker Lock Set Your Own Combination Padlock, 1 Pack, Assorted Colors
product_meta.description: The Master Lock 653D set your own combination padlock features a 2in (50mm) wide metal body for strength and durability. The 1/4in (6mm) diameter shackle is 15/16in (24mm) long and made of hardened steel, offering extra resistance to cutting and sawing. The soft touch bottom and sides provide no-slip gripping. The limited lifetime provides peace of mind from a brand you can trust.
feature_bullets: Indoor padlock is best used as a school Locker lock and gym lock, providing Basic protection and security from theft
Set your own four-digit combination lock with non-slip grip for easy handling; bright Color for easy identification
Combo lock is constructed with a metal body and hardened steel shackle
2 in. (51mm) wide lock body; 1/4 in. (6 mm) diameter shackle with 15/16 in. (24 mm) length, 3/4 in. (19 mm) Width
Available in red, blue, yellow, and Orange (Color randomly selected at time of shipment)

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars2,428 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
